patterns.name: Beacon Pattern
patterns.tonEquivalent: Controller/beacon contract issuing versioned set_code updates
patterns.notes: Replace beacon indirection with explicit code-version controller contract.

architectureChanges.title: Asynchronous Message Passing
architectureChanges.description: TON uses async actor-style interactions, no synchronous reentry-like call stack.
architectureChanges.recommendation: Create request/response messages with query_id and bounce handlers.

architectureChanges.title: Cell-Oriented Storage
architectureChanges.description: State is encoded in cells/slices/refs, not a flat EVM slot map.
architectureChanges.recommendation: Define stable load/save layouts and include state schema version.

architectureChanges.title: Forward Fee Aware Design
architectureChanges.description: Message forwarding cost and storage rent change control flow economics.
architectureChanges.recommendation: Attach value budgeting per outbound message and rent-safe balances.

architectureChanges.title: TVM set_code Upgrade Recipes
architectureChanges.description: Proxy families map to guarded set_code flows with data migration.
architectureChanges.recommendation: Implement upgrade opcode + governance check + post-upgrade migrate().

response.summary:
Migration Analysis Summary
==========================
Source Language: SOLIDITY
Files: 1
Lines of Code: 253
Complexity Score: 5/10
Estimated Effort: 1-2 weeks

Deep Signals:
- Inheritance chains: 0
- Interface imports: 1
- Proxy styles: beacon
- Modifiers: 0
- External call edges: 0

Recommended pipeline:
1) Flatten inheritance + resolve interfaces
2) Rewrite upgrades to set_code recipes
3) Inline modifiers
4) Transform external call graph to async state machines
